document_data.name: Sharna
document_data.mainbody: '''Sharna''' was a [[paladin]] of [[Helm]] who was uncommonly strong for her size.
document_data.Description: Sharna was a petite woman with symmetrical facial features, blue eyes, and long, brown hair.
document_data.Possessions: She used a pair of ''[[gauntlets of ogre power]]'' to boost her already considerable strength. Sharna also owned a suit of [[chain mail]], a shield, and a ''[[longsword of sharpness]]''.
document_data.Activities:
The dissonance between Sharna's size and strength worked in her favor, and she occasionally used it to shame "tough guys" into worshiping Helm.

Sharna had plans to travel to [[Maztica]] to aid in converting the local populace to the Helmite faith.
